{"step_by_step_thinking": "The aluminium filter in the primary beam of radiation is not used to reduce exposure time or decrease development time of the films. It also doesn't directly contribute to obtaining greater definition of the images of teeth. The main purpose of the aluminium filter is to filter out low-energy x-rays from the beam before it reaches the patient, thereby reducing the dose of radiation to the patient's skin.", "answer_choice": "C"}
